Message:
I spread out my map.
Maps are the shape of the world...!
If the world has a shape, it exists!
This town is gone, so it gets an X.

The map was covered in X’s,
to the point it was almost
entirely covered in black ink.

Is this...the shape of
the world now...?

...No! I can’t just
sit around crying!
The world isn’t done for yet!

’Cause...I’m still here!
And everyone else
in here is, too...!

I won’t give up...!
I’m an adventurer!

If an adventurer stops,
then their journey does, too!

Clutching the map in my hands,
I took a deep breath.
